sentences.english: I hope that everyone can understand the outpourings and bitterness in such delicate moments as these.

sentences.english: In order to make better use of these resources, lipase-catalyzed acidolysis of lard with caprylic acid to produce functional lipids was investigated.

sentences.english: This legendary man has endured almost all the bitterness of human life.

sentences.english: He told us a long tale of woe.

sentences.english: Refulgent phenomena is not real, the true-life is full of bitterness and contradiction.

sentences.english: She was full of hatred and bitterness.
The recent methods of separating lipoic acid from lipoic acid and ethanol aqueous were reviewed in this paper.
